title: (x) El-Phoenician restaurant - Faerie {David Hamuel}
content:
Hello folks,   
This is a strange gaelic/celtic/uncial font - some letters don't even look gaelic/celtic in origin to me. It's not Libra, Omnia, Priory or even Karolinger EF. Any ideas...   
   
\<a href=" [http://www.fontfactory.com/font\_id/elphoenician1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000409/http:/www.fontfactory.com/font_id/elphoenician1.jpg)"\>   
   
How do you post images to this forum by the way?
author: skyrocket

comments.content: Thanks David but I can not find any reference to a font caled "Cornwall" (except for an internet freebie that bears no resemblance). Can you point me in the right direction?

It looks like Scriptorium's Celtic Alba Text.   
   
 [http://www.fontcraft.com/Merchant2/merchant.mv?Screen=PROD&Store\_Code=cdstore&Product\_Code=alba&Category\_Code=text](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000409/http:/www.fontcraft.com/Merchant2/merchant.mv?Screen=PROD&Store_Code=cdstore&Product_Code=alba&Category_Code=text)

check [www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/13632.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000409/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/13632.html)   
   
[sorry. there's a RED Line. and that's my red line - i don't know what is freebie, free fonts etc etc]   
   
   
   
David Hamuel

Thanks everyone. If I had the power I would bestow upon you the title of typohillius legendissimo. The font David mentions called "Faerie" sure looks like the one. ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000409im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

heh - Earl Grey tea! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000409im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif) This forum is the dogs bollux. I have done a full character dump of "Faerie" and David is spot on. That's the font all right. I'll be back with more tough mystery fonts for you lot.

_This forum is the dogs bollux_   
   
Nah, it's the cat's arse on toast.

Yves,   
\>Oh no, there he goes again... SOMEBODY PLEASE STOP HIM!   
No way! Doesn't look like you get many folk posting in this part of the forum so I reckon I should do my bit to keep your grey matter ticking over. Heck - you Typophiles seem to do it for fun (see Pop Quiz threads). As for the dogs bollux - well, who says I'm Australian? TTFN ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000409im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
very good sherlock ;) - I'm actually dual nationality (depending on who's winning in sport). I'm going to be english next month because they're going to win the Rugby world cup!
